Thanks for Purple Hearts (you must have really liked it!) and The Gauntlet (the best of the Clint Eastwood/Sondra Locke movies, imho--and I LOVED her front & back lace-up jeans!).
Thanks for most of these movies! This is like a great xmas present! have a great holiday and merry christmas!!

Thanks again for your truly fine work! This isn't a request, but on Christmas eve, the BBC are showing a remake of the classic Christmas ghost story 'whistle and I'll come to you' with the great John Hurt. I advise anyone interested to also check out the original 1968 version with the great Michael Hordern. You can get it from one of the free UK TV archive sites (thebox.bz or uknova.com). Check out the others too, 'A Warning To The Curious' in particular is one of the best things ever made on TV. 

All the best and Happy Christmas!

[url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Ghost_Story_for_Christmas[/url]

EDIT: They are here after all- d'oh :)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3949990/Whistle_And_I____ll_Come_To_You_(BBC_Omnibus_1968)

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3893929/A_warning_to_the_Curious_BBC-TV.Dvd-rip

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Ghost_Story_for_Christmas

It's still worth checking out those archive sites though (keep trying if you can't sign up atm)

Cheers
